text: Sorry for the slow reply. How to calculate a favourable price (but one which will get matched) is obviously a trade secret for anyone that’s profitable. My only tip with offering is to say it’s just as important to remove your offer if you deem it not to be of good value anymore. A favourable price you calculate now might not be the same favourable price in X seconds. So just leaving an offer up indefinitely is generally a route to ruin.
